premium.title: Free up your Cozy!
premium.content: To unlock this feature, or simply support us, you can change your Cozy offer.

public.title: Information

default.title: Information
default.content: Your current offer does not allow you to take advantage of this feature. Please [contact us](mailto:%{mail}) to update your subscription.
